verses.verse: There <S%G1161><s%> were present <S%G3918><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G846><s%> season <S%G2540><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> that told <S%G518><s%> him <S%G846><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Galilaeans, <S%G1057><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> had mingled <S%G3396><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sacrifices. <S%G2378><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Suppose <S%G1380><s%> ye that <S%G3754><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> Galilaeans <S%G1057><s%> were <S%G1096><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> above <S%G3844><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Galilaeans, <S%G1057><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they suffered <S%G3958><s%> such things? <S%G5108><s%>

I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> Nay: <S%G3780><s%> but, <S%G235><s%> except <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> ye repent, <S%G3340><s%> ye shall all <S%G3956><s%> likewise <S%G5615><s%> perish. <S%G622><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> eighteen, <S%G1176><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3638><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> tower <S%G4444><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Siloam <S%G4611><s%> fell, <S%G4098><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> slew <S%G615><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> think <S%G1380><s%> ye that <S%G3754><s%> they <S%G3778><s%> were <S%G1096><s%> sinners <S%G3781><s%> above <S%G3844><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%> that dwelt <S%G2730><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem? <S%G2419><s%>

I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> Nay: <S%G3780><s%> but, <S%G235><s%> except <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> ye repent, <S%G3340><s%> ye shall all <S%G3956><s%> likewise <S%G3668><s%> perish. <S%G622><s%>

He spake <S%G3004><s%> also <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> parable; <S%G3850><s%> A certain <S%G5100><s%> man had <S%G2192><s%> a fig tree <S%G4808><s%> planted <S%G5452><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G848><s%> vineyard; <S%G290><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> and sought <S%G2212><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> thereon, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> none. <S%G3756><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> he unto <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> dresser of his vineyard, <S%G289><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> these three <S%G5140><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> fig tree, <S%G4808><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> find <S%G2147><s%> none: <S%G3756><s%> cut it down; <S%G1581><s%> <S%G846><s%> why <S%G2444><s%> <S%G2532><s%> encumbereth <S%G2673><s%> it the <S%G3588><s%> ground? <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> let it alone <S%G863><s%> <S%G846><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> year <S%G2094><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3755><s%> I shall dig <S%G4626><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> dung <S%G906><s%> <S%G2874><s%> it:

And if <S%G2579><s%> it <S%G3303><s%> bear <S%G4160><s%> fruit, <S%G2590><s%> well: and if not, <S%G1490><s%> then after that <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3195><s%> thou shalt cut it down. <S%G1581><s%> <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> synagogues <S%G4864><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> which had <S%G2192><s%> a spirit <S%G4151><s%> of infirmity <S%G769><s%> eighteen <S%G1176><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3638><s%> years, <S%G2094><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> bowed together, <S%G4794><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> in no wise <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3838><s%> lift up <S%G352><s%> herself.

And <S%G1161><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> her, <S%G846><s%> he called <S%G4377><s%> her to him, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto her, <S%G846><s%> Woman, <S%G1135><s%> thou art loosed <S%G630><s%> from thine <S%G4675><s%> infirmity. <S%G769><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he laid <S%G2007><s%> his hands <S%G5495><s%> on her: <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G3916><s%> she was made straight, <S%G461><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> glorified <S%G1392><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> ruler of the synagogue <S%G752><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> with indignation, <S%G23><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had healed <S%G2323><s%> on the <S%G3588><s%> sabbath day, <S%G4521><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> people, <S%G3793><s%> There are <S%G1526><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> men ought <S%G1163><s%> to work: <S%G2038><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G5025><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be healed, <S%G2323><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> on the <S%G3588><s%> sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Thou hypocrite, <S%G5273><s%> doth not <S%G3756><s%> each one <S%G1538><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> on the <S%G3588><s%> sabbath <S%G4521><s%> loose <S%G3089><s%> his <S%G848><s%> ox <S%G1016><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his ass <S%G3688><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> stall, <S%G5336><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lead him away <S%G520><s%> to watering? <S%G4222><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> ought <S%G1163><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> this woman, <S%G5026><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> a daughter <S%G2364><s%> of Abraham, <S%G11><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> hath bound, <S%G1210><s%> lo, <S%G2400><s%> these eighteen <S%G1176><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3638><s%> years, <S%G2094><s%> be loosed <S%G3089><s%> from <S%G575><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> bond <S%G1199><s%> on the <S%G3588><s%> sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day? <S%G2250><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he <S%G846><s%> had said <S%G3004><s%> these things, <S%G5023><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G846><s%> adversaries <S%G480><s%> were ashamed: <S%G2617><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> rejoiced <S%G5463><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> glorious things <S%G1741><s%> that were done <S%G1096><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> he, Unto what <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> like? <S%G3664><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> whereunto <S%G5101><s%> shall I resemble <S%G3666><s%> it? <S%G846><s%>

It is <S%G2076><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> a grain <S%G2848><s%> of mustard seed, <S%G4615><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> took, <S%G2983><s%> and cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> garden; <S%G2779><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it grew, <S%G837><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> waxed <S%G1096><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> tree; <S%G1186><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fowls <S%G4071><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> air <S%G3772><s%> lodged <S%G2681><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> branches <S%G2798><s%> of it. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> Whereunto <S%G5101><s%> shall I liken <S%G3666><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>

It is <S%G2076><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> leaven, <S%G2219><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> and hid <S%G1470><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> measures <S%G4568><s%> of meal, <S%G224><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3757><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> was leavened. <S%G2220><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he went <S%G1279><s%> through <S%G2596><s%> the cities <S%G4172><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> villages, <S%G2968><s%> teaching, <S%G1321><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> journeying <S%G4160><s%> <S%G4197><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> are <S%G1487><s%> there few <S%G3641><s%> that be saved? <S%G4982><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them, <S%G846><s%>

Strive <S%G75><s%> to enter in <S%G1525><s%> at <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> strait <S%G4728><s%> gate: <S%G4439><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> many, <S%G4183><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> will seek <S%G2212><s%> to enter in, <S%G1525><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall not <S%G3756><s%> be able. <S%G2480><s%>

When once <S%G575><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> master of the house <S%G3617><s%> is risen up, <S%G1453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hath shut to <S%G608><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> door, <S%G2374><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye begin <S%G756><s%> to stand <S%G2476><s%> without, <S%G1854><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to knock <S%G2925><s%> at the <S%G3588><s%> door, <S%G2374><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> open <S%G455><s%> unto us; <S%G2254><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he shall answer <S%G611><s%> and say <S%G2046><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> whence <S%G4159><s%> ye are: <S%G2075><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> shall ye begin <S%G756><s%> to say, <S%G3004><s%> We have eaten <S%G5315><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drunk <S%G4095><s%> in thy presence, <S%G1799><s%> <S%G4675><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thou hast taught <S%G1321><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> streets. <S%G4113><s%>

But <S%G2532><s%> he shall say, <S%G2046><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> whence <S%G4159><s%> ye are; <S%G2075><s%> depart <S%G868><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me, <S%G1700><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> ye workers <S%G2040><s%> of iniquity. <S%G93><s%>

There <S%G1563><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> weeping <S%G2805><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth, <S%G3599><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> ye shall see <S%G3700><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Jacob, <S%G2384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> prophets, <S%G4396><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> yourselves thrust <S%G1544><s%> out. <S%G1854><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they shall come <S%G2240><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the east, <S%G395><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> from the west, <S%G1424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the north, <S%G1005><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> from the south, <S%G3558><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall sit down <S%G347><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of <S%G2316><s%> God.

And, <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> first, <S%G4413><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> last. <S%G2078><s%>

The <S%G1722><s%> same <S%G846><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> there came <S%G4334><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> of the Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Get thee out, <S%G1831><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> depart <S%G4198><s%> hence: <S%G1782><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> kill <S%G615><s%> thee. <S%G4571><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Go <S%G4198><s%> ye, and tell <S%G2036><s%> that <S%G5026><s%> fox, <S%G258><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I cast out <S%G1544><s%> devils, <S%G1140><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I do <S%G2005><s%> cures <S%G2392><s%> today <S%G4594><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> tomorrow, <S%G839><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> third <S%G5154><s%> day I shall be perfected. <S%G5048><s%>

Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> I <S%G3165><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> walk <S%G4198><s%> today, <S%G4594><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> tomorrow, <S%G839><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> day following: <S%G2192><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> it cannot be <S%G1735><s%> <S%G3756><s%> that a prophet <S%G4396><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> out <S%G1854><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

O Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> which killest <S%G615><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> stonest <S%G3036><s%> them that are sent <S%G649><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> thee; <S%G846><s%> how often <S%G4212><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> I have gathered thy children together, <S%G1996><s%> <S%G4675><s%> <S%G5043><s%> as <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5158><s%> a hen <S%G3733><s%> doth gather her <S%G1438><s%> brood <S%G3555><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> her wings, <S%G4420><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye would <S%G2309><s%> not! <S%G3756><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> is left <S%G863><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> desolate: <S%G2048><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> Ye shall not <S%G3364><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> <S%G302><s%> the time come <S%G2240><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> ye shall say, <S%G2036><s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is he that cometh <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
